products.name: Air Jordan XXXIX PF 'Noir'
products.description: On the court, MJ was known for his fierceness and agility, earning the nickname Black Cat. This all-black AJ39 honours that legacy while bringing you a shoe tailored to today's modern game. So, while your look stays high class, your low game benefits from the lightweight ZoomX foam and snappy Air Zoom cushioning.

products.name: Tatum 3 PF
products.description: Made for movers and shakers, the Tatum 3 offers a contouring fit in a lightweight design, helping you dominate the game in the smoothest of fashion. Sound familiar? A strong but flexible upper gives you the containment and stretch that quick cuts and dynamic movements demand. So, whether you're breaking records or ankles, you can shift in and out of action just like the champ himself. No pressure.

products.name: Nike Air Force 1 '07 Next Nature
products.description: The radiance lives on in the Air Force 1 '07, the b-ball icon that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: crisp materials, bold colours and the perfect amount of flash to make you shine.
